typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CoopID as string,
		CoopName as string,
		ProdID as float,
		ProdName as string,
		ManifestNum as string,
		LT_No as float,
		CustID as float,
		CustName as string,
		HaulerID as string,
		HaulerName as string,
		ScaleHeavy as float,
		SchPickUpDate as timestamp,
		ActualPickUpDate as timestamp,
		SchDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		RouteNum as string,
		Rejected as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: ($Datasource),
	wildcardPaths:['*.xlsx']) ~> MIMSservice
MIMSservice sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		CoopID as string,
		CoopName as string,
		ProdID as double,
		ProdName as string,
		ManifestNum as string,
		LT_No as double,
		CustID as double,
		CustName as string,
		HaulerID as string,
		HaulerName as string,
		ScaleHeavy as double,
		SchPickUpDate as timestamp,
		ActualPickUpDate as timestamp,
		SchDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		RouteNum as string,
		Rejected as double,
		ServiceID as integer,
		Datasource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'yyyy-mm-dd',
	timestampFormat:'00:00:00',
	booleanFormat: ['1', '0'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: 'processlogs',
	rejectedData_folderPath: 'rejectedRecords',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: true,
	mapColumn(
		CoopID = CoopName,
		CoopName,
		ProdID,
		ProdName,
		ManifestNum,
		LT_No,
		CustID,
		CustName,
		HaulerID,
		HaulerName,
		ScaleHeavy,
		SchPickUpDate,
		ActualPickUpDate,
		SchDeliveryDate,
		ActualDeliveryDate,
		RouteNum,
		Rejected,
		Datasource
	)) ~> tblService
